body.p:
To His Excellency-
Hon J. F. Robinson
T. E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky.

We, the undersigned, believing it would be a great hardship, and under the circumstances unjust, were Messrs Wm Bowen & Stone compelled to pay the forfeited Recognizance in the case of the Commonwealth agst. H. Bowen et al. do hereby petition your Excellency to remit the amount of the forfeiture.

H Reynolds
Hamilton Forman
Silvester Kindwell
Henry ^my X mark^ Coneley
George Sheffield
Richard A Randall
John French S P C
J. H. Scholl C. P. c. c.
Tho. C. Judy C. P. C C
Watson Stewart
James McDaniel
D. P. Horrow
J Boone
J N B Hardwill J P G C
S. Randall J. P. P. C
F. W. Hatton
Peter H Anderson
J. H Johns
Massen Gill Martin
B,, J. Martin
Henry Folkner
J. N Lacy
Arsted Fokner
Tilford Webster
Hezekiah Morton
Orlando D Forkner
R. S. Forman
John W. Hazelrigg

His Excellency
Hon T. E. Bramlette

I have written out a statement of the case, which I send in another Envelope. -It having been written before you was inaugurated is addressed to Hon. J. F. R. Many more signatures might have been obtained: but I did not consider it necessary, as this contains the Sheriff of Powel Co. Co Judge &c

Very Resply
W. H. Holt Mt Sterling
